text: Petropavl (, ) is a city in Kazakhstan, the capital of the North Kazakhstan Region. It is located on the right bank of the Ishim River. As of 2023, 222,044 people live here. It is also known as Qyzyljar () among Kazakh people. Petropavl is located 40 km from the border with Russia. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Kazakhstan Category:North Kazakhstan Region
title: Petropavl
